mapper.select: select b.bug_id, u.user_id find_user_id, u.user_name find_user_name, ty.bug_type_id, ty.bug_type_name, l.bug_leave_id, l.bug_leave_name, t.tower_id, t.good_proc, b.des, up.user_id from_user_id, up.user_name from_user_name, p.from_date, b.find_time from bug b left join sys_user u on u.user_id = b.find_user_id left join tower t on t.tower_id = b.tower_id left join poll_task p on p.task_id = b.poll_task_id left join sys_user up on up.user_id = p.from_user_id left join bug_type ty on ty.bug_type_id = b.bug_type_id left join bug_leave l on l.bug_leave_id = b.bug_leave_id where p.task_id=#{taskId} and t.tower_id=#{towerId}

select * from (select * from (select rownum rn, z.* from bug z) b left join tower t on t.tower_id = b.tower_id left join poll_task p_t on p_t.task_id = b.poll_task_id left join circuit c on c.circuit_id = p_t.circuit_id left join bug_leave b_l on b_l.bug_leave_id = b.bug_leave_id left join bug_type b_t on b_t.bug_type_id = b.bug_type_id order by rn) where rn > #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(*) from bug where behe_task_id in (select behe_task_id from bug)

select * from (select rownum rn, bt.task_id, bt.task_name, it.circuit_id, it.start_tower_id, it.end_tower_id, bl.bug_leave_name, bug.bug_id, bug.tower_id, ve.bug_type_name, bt.ok_time, bug.find_time, pt.des from behe_task bt bug.des from behe_task bt left join bug bug on bt.task_id = bug.behe_task_id left join poll_task pt on pt.task_id = bug.poll_task_id left join circuit it on it.circuit_id = pt.circuit_id left join bug_leave bl on bl.bug_leave_id = bug.bug_leave_id left join bug_type ve on ve.bug_type_id = bug.bug_type_id)where rn > #{start} and rn <= #{end}
